channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- Parsson
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- Parsson

item.title: CVE-2023-4043|2024-09-05T14:31:17.127Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- parsson
item.description:
In Eclipse Parsson before versions 1.1.4 and 1.0.5, Parsing JSON from untrusted sources can lead malicious actors to exploit the fact that the built-in support for parsing numbers with large scale in Java has a number of edge cases where the input text of a number can lead to much larger processing time than one would expect.
To mitigate the risk, parsson put in place a size limit for the numbers as well as their scale.

item.title: CVE-2023-7272|2024-08-02T08:57:35.165Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- parsson
item.description: In Eclipse Parsson before 1.0.4 and 1.1.3, a document with a large depth of nested objects can allow an attacker to cause a Java stack overflow exception and denial of service. Eclipse Parsson allows processing (e.g. parse, generate, transform and query) JSON documents.

item.title: CVE-2023-7272|2024-07-18T13:31:25.196Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- parsson
item.description: In Eclipse Parsson before 1.0.4 and 1.1.3, a document with a large depth of nested objects can allow an attacker to cause a Java stack overflow exception and denial of service. Eclipse Parsson allows processing (e.g. parse, generate, transform and query) JSON documents.
